title: What are the similarities between the pre-colonial period and the Spanish colonial period? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both the Inca and the Azrtec had powerful centralised governments, enslaved and killed their enemy, and outsized militaries. All very like Spain itself. For many it was only a change of masters .Plus the introduction of the Horse.
